name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure

reviews.name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: Im in UT and need something for winter, I put mine in the basement and my kids and there friends love it.
reviews.title: great for my 2 & 3 year ole

reviews.name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: I am so pleased with this trampoline I was scared at first that it would be to small for my soon to be 5 year old. I was wrong it is perfect! We had one of the huge ones but it got destroyed in a tornado and I wanted something that I could take down or that would fit in my garage if it needed to. This is perfect for both. I was also afraid that she wouldn't like this one because it is a lot smaller then the one we had before. But my little girl loves this one better then the big one. I would recommend this to anyone including my worst enemy. LOL
reviews.title: 14 May 2013

reviews.name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I put this together in an hour. It went together very nicely. I have an 8 year old, 5 year old and 2 year old. They absolutely love it. Great exercise for the winter time and they love that Santa brought this to them.
reviews.title: Entertaining and great exercise

reviews.name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for my 3 yr old and his 5 yr old neighbor. They love it and the sides keep them from tumbling out.
reviews.title: Kids Trampoline- pure joy

reviews.name: Bazoongi 7' Hexagonal Kids Combo Trampoline and Enclosure
reviews.title: 13 December 2012
